name: SeriesGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask Series Guide when is the next episode of Game of Thrones”
”Alexa, ask Series Guide when is the next episode of Bachelorette”
”Alexa, ask Series Guide when is the next episode of The Big Bang Theory”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: series guide
des:
Series Guide is a skill that is dedicated to tell you when the next episode of your favorite series will air.

Give it a try by asking,

Alexa, ask Series Guide when is the next episode of Game of Thrones
Alexa, ask Series Guide when is the next episode of Suits
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
